div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvjo die
mensis Julij anno quo supra

The said day Androw skynner grantit him awand' to Androw litstar x s'
quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay withtin terme of lawe

The said day Williame colly skynner grantit to releif Androw skynner
of v s' at the handis of Androw litstar withtin terme of lawe

The siad day Alexander Ramsay cordinar grantit to pay to Androw barcar
viij s' to morn' the said Androw gevand' him ane pund' and' ane half of
hempe

The said day Androw cullane prouest grantit him ressauit be the handis
of James colisone his girssome and' maile for his fisching of the wattir
of Done quhilk he has in tak of the toune eftir the tenour of the asseda
cioun

The said day Androw cullane prouest askit diuers' tymes at Isabell
crichtoun' and patry chernsid' tene merkis of girssome for for the fisching
of the wattir of Done eftir the tenour of the assedacioun' quhilkis
the said patry and' Isabell refusit and' wauld' nocht pay tharfor
the prouest protestit solemptlie that he mycht dispone apoun' thar takis
eftir the tenour of the actis maid tharupoun' apone the quhilkis
the prouest askis Instrument befor Dauid menyeis gilbert menyeis
Johnne colisone thomas lesly thomas Wod' thomas Waus
Johnne cullan' Johnne' ratre James colisoune

The said day the prouest and' bailyes continewit the takin of the pre
uis and' ale that actioun' in siclik forme force and' effect as it standis
nowe / to monunday that nixt cumis / but preiudice to ony party

The said day the bailyes assignit this day xv dais to thome
storour to ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be sande prat for the
wranguis' withhaldin fra him of xxxv xxxiiij s' for an' hors'

The said day the bailyes chargit and' ordanit Johne' Wilyongsone and Williame
Walcar to gar warn' the personis that was chosin betuix tham anent the
clame of the spilling of ane pece claitht one monunday that nixt cumis that
is to say the said Johnne' the personis that ar vnsuorn' and' the said William
the remanent of the personis that was apon' the said matir

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xix die mensis
Julij Anno quo supra et cetera

The said day the prouest and Johnne colisone ane of the bailyes present for the tyme
dischargit thame of ale thingis pertenyng to my lord of Abirdenis Jurisdictioune
and speciale anent ane govne debatable betuix Isabell crichtone the relict of
vmquhill Johne Wormet one that an' part and' William Wormet on' that vthir part

The said day mastir Jonhne marscheale forspekar for William Wormet allegit the
gowne follouit be Johne mar' forspekar for Isabele crichtone as ayrschip testit
gude and left to William Wormet in testment and deliuerit to him as testit geir'
Ande offerit him to preiwe the befor the commissar of Abirdene as efferis

The said' day Dauid theman deponit be his aithe that the govne persevit be Isabel
of crichtone and Johne of mar' hir forspekar as airschip to Jame Wormet and being
in the handis of William Wormet was last maide and Johne Wormet wonyr' It
for his best govne bot he wat nocht gif it was his best govne
William mar' skynner kennys nocht gif it was his best govne
Johne mar' talyour depnot be his that yone govne was his best govne
bessy Wormet be hir' athe concludis with Dauid themannis deposicioun'
The wif of Dauid theman Concordis with the said' Dauid deposicioun'
William Wormet be his aithe he wat nocht gif it was Johne Wormetis best govne
he trowis he hed' ane bettir govne

The said' day the aldirman and balyeis gert oppin' the said' deposicionis and
continevit the warde and dome tharapon' to friday that next cumis

The said' day Johne buchane baxtar be his avne toung graunt was
in ane amerciament of the court for trubulance of Androw cullane provest and to
amend' as law wile and forber' in tym' to Cum

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiij die Julij
anno supra

Eodem die patricius Walcar' conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore Johannis ratre prelocutoris
eiusdem pro perturbio malcomj Williamsone Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt
et dictus malcomus quitus fuit de perturbio ipsius malcomj pro cuius emenda
diliberatum fuit per assisam quod prefatus patricius soluet vnam li' Cere lumen
sancti sanguinis et cetera ac barbetensorj pro sanacione dictj malcomj

The said' day the balyeis dischargit thame of the borghe' fundin one William
Walcar' be Johne Wilyongsone Anent the Spilling of ane pece of clatht
becaus' it was at Arbitry

The said' day William Wormet askit warde and dome anent the witnes producit
agane tueching ane govne follouit as airschip be Isabele crichtone and protestit
for Remed' of law et cetera

The saide day It was statutit and ordanit be the prouest balyeis and Counsale
present for the tyme that the iiij officiaris and the cunaris sale pas' ouklie Ilkan sonday
throu the haile toune euire officiar' with his cunar throw his avne quartar and cvne
the haile and Set it eftir vaile of that is to say gude provabile aile for viij d'
the galloun' and vthir aile to sex s' iiij d' eftir as it is of gudnes and that thai
broustaris within this burghe brew nayn aile derar thane viij d' nor sele vndir
the pane of brekin of thar Caldroun' and lede bodome and of ane amerciament vnfor
gevin quhile michelmes day next to Cum

The said day It was statut and ordanit be the prouest balyeis and Counsale that
nay Coupar within this burghe' sale pak not' hed' fische Salmonde nor' girlss'
quhile thai schew to the prouest Customar' and ij or iij of the Counsale

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvj
die mensis Julij Anno quo supra et cetera

The said dy the bailyes assignit this day xv dais to Johnne listar to an
suer to the borgh' fundin one him be ser Johnne litstar for the wranguis' takin
and withhaldin fra him of the keis of the vuere chamer and' the loft of the samyn'
for the quhilkis he has laid' his said hous' wast et cetera and' awe to re
compens' him the skaitht / extending to xxxvj s' in the yeir be gud'
estimacioun'

The said day Dauid steuart lauchfully callit warnit and nocht comperit
to ansueir to the borgh' fundin one him be Johnne of murray for the wran
guis' withthaldin fra him of tua french' crovnis xliiij eduard grotis
and demi Inglis grotis tharfor the bailyes chargit Normunde lesly offiicar
to pas and' tak ane stras' of the said Dauid and lat it agane
to borgh' gif it be askit and' warn' him to Compeir this day xv
dais as secund' day of proces'

The said day Johnne collison skynner was conuict be ane suorne assis'
Johnne cullane forspekar for the tribulance of William skynner And'
the said Williame conuict for the tribulance of the said' Johne for
the quhilkis thai war in ane amerciament of the Court and' to amend'
as law will and' forbeir in tyme to cum

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem penultimo
die mensis Julij Anno quo supra

The said day thomas storour lauchfully warnit callit and' nocht comperit
to ansueir to the borgh' fundin one him be Alexander prat for the wrang
uis withthalding fra him of xxxiiij s' for ane hors' bocht fra the said' Alexander
tharfor the bailyes chargit William scrimgeour officiar to tak ane
stras' of the said thomas storouris and' lat it agan' to borgh' gif it
ba askit and' warn' him to comperit this day xv dais to ansueir
to the said borgh' as first secund day of proces'

Inquisicio facta Apud burgum de Abirdene penultimo die mensis Julij anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo
septimo Coram honorabilibus virum thoma Waus et thoma Wode duobus balliuorum dicti burgi in
pretorio eiusdem protribunali sedentes per subscriptum videlicet Johannem Ratre Dauid mar' Willelmum
futhes Dauid straloche Willelmum Kintor Duncanum fyf malcomum Crag Willelmum
rollande Andream meldrum Robertum Kemintj Andream stravne Alexandrum prat et Johannem
Watsone burgenses dicti burgj qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam Elizibetht gray
alias talyour soro magistri Andree gray alias talyour latoris presencium obiit vltra vestita et sasita
ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra quindecim vlnas in
longitudine continen' Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter
terras quondam Johannis talyour et mariote chamer sponse sue ex orientali et occidentali partibus et terram
Andree cullan versus austrum et terram quondam Willelmum tulidef versus boream et de cauda
orti eiusdem tenementi sine terre sexaginta et quatuor vlnas in longitudine continenti
extendenti ad communionem viam regiam versus oriens cum liberum Introitu et exitu ad omnes portas anteriores tociens quociens
terre anterioris eiusdem tenementi Et quod dictus magister Andreas est legitimus
et propinquior heres dicti quondam elizibetht sororis sue de dictis terre et tanda cum suis
pertinencijs et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicte terre et cauda cum pertinencijs Et quod dicte
terre et cauda cum pertinencijs valerit nunc per annum xxtj s' et clauerunt v s'
tempore pacis Et quod tenentur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium
burgagium Et quod nunc existit in manibus domini nostri Regis per spacium quinque mensium
aut eocirca per decessum quondam dicte mariote chamer liberum tenementum eiusdem hereditatis pro toto tempore
vite sue in defectu verj heredis Jus suum hucusque minime prosequentis datis et clausis

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem secundo
die mensis Augustij Anno quo supra et cetera

The said day the alderman bailyes ande counsaill conducit and' feit Johnne fif
to sing vphauld' and sustene divin seruice mess' matutinis ewinsange
complitorijs and' v ale vthir song divin seruice withtin thar queyr and
quheir and' kirk at ale his possibilite to the fulfilling and' kepin of
the quhilkis the said Johnne' oblist him be the faitht of his bodie to the
prouest and' bailyes in the tovnis name ffor the quhilkis thai promittit
to him his met and' drink honestly be thar personis circualy in the ouk
that is to say Dauid andersone one the sonday Androw fif one monunday Wil
yeame Rolland' one tuisday Dauid steuart one Wednisday Duncan
colisone one thurisday Duncan fif one friday patry chirnsid' on'
settirday Ande atour thai haue assignit to him xl s' of the malys
of the vuirmile and ane forstallar' to be chosin be him Self for his fee
of this Instant yer'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
Sexto die mensis augusti anno quo supra

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicionem Curie quod Johannes Cruk
schank est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam Johannis Crukschank patris
suj

The said day Dauid Stevart grantit that he was aving to gilbert
menyeis j barrele of girls' and allegit he hed' dischargit him tharof
and tane ane vthir dettour and tuk to preiw his said allegiance
and bailyeis assignit monunday that nixt cumis to the said Dauid to
preiff Sufficiently befor thame that the said gilbert hed dischargit
him of the said j barrell of girlss'

The said day Johnne of mar tailyour tuk to preiw that Jonet norys
caldroune is awing to him vj s' one monunday that nixt cumis suffi
ciently befor thame And' gif he failyes in his prewe he sale deliuer
the said caldroun' fra him to the said Jonet

Eodem die Johannes murray Junior fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Johannem
Mar patricium lesly et Willelmum rolland coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimos
et indubitatos procuratores dantes et concedentes eisdem ac eorum cuilibet ac suis
substitutis pluribus aut vnj suam liberam et omnimodam potestatem ac mandatum
speciale pro se et nomine suo ad prosequendum plegium per eum super Dauid
steuart porrectum pro Iniusta detencione ab eo duorum scutorum aureorum
gallicorum quadraginta quatuor grossorum le eduard grotis et demi vnius
anglicj grossi et in omnibus aliis suis actionibus ipsum concernens agen
dum calumpniandum defendendum ceteraque omnia et singula facienda et cetera pro
mittens de rato et grato cum ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportunis in
vberiore forma procuratorij

The said day gilbert menyeis follouit Dauid steuart for the
half of Sevin quartis of wyne quhilkis the said Dauid denyit
and the said gilbert tuk him to preiff It and producit him Self
and askit him to be suorne and depone in the said matir gif he
bad nocht hald the said wyne one him and' thomas chamer And'
thareftir w the said Dauid was suorne and his deposicionis continevit
to be takin quhile monunday that nixt Cumis

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
nono die mensis' Augustj Anno quo supra

The said day the bailyeis continewit the preiwe of ane barrele
of girls' betuix Dauid steuart ande gilbert menyes quhile
friday that nixt cumis in siclik forme as It standis nowe

The said day Dauid steuart lauchfully warnit callit and nocht
comperit tile ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be Johnne of
murray for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of tua franche
crovnis xliiij eduard' grotis and demi Inglis grotis et cetera tharfor the
bailyeis chrgit Williame scrimgeor officiar to pas' ande tak
ane stres' of the said Dauid and lat it agane to borgh' and itbe
askit and warne him to Comper' this day xv days as thrid day
of proces' tile Ansuer' to the said borghe'

The said day comperit Johnne crukschank alias tailyour sone
and ayr tile vmquhile Johnne Crukschank alias tailyour with Johne'
Ratre his forspekar and chesit consitut maid and ordanit Johne'
Craik conburges of the said burgh' his curator to governe his person'
his landis ande gudis as efferis ane Curator to do Ande
generall ale vthir and Sindrie thingis to do excerce and vys'
pertening of lawe to the office of curatory quhile he cum
to perfit age vpon' the quhilkis the said Johnne craik askit
Instrument vndir the Seile of thomas Waus and thomas Wod'
ballies befor thir witnes Duncan fyf androw barkar ser Dauid
Waus ser thomas Wricht chaplanis Alexander nory Johnne
fif Williame scrimgeor Normond' leslie seriandis

xj die Augustj anno dominj Millesimo quingentesimo vijo x' ponitus domini nostrj
Julij proper secundj anno quarto Dauid steuart fecit constituit creauit et nominauit
Agnetem menyes sponsam suam suum assignat' in et ad terras de portar
ston' et piscarias suas demi Rethis de mydchingile ad subsidium
et suj et suarum in vberiore forma assignacionis fraude et
dolo seclus' Sibi quibus dictam Agnes peciit intrumentum Act' erant hec
in communi via regia castrj de Abirdene hoc consimilj ix anno in erediem Testibus
Johanne ratre Johanne andersone Dauid Kintor et domino Willelmo myln'
The haill proces' led' be Johnne of murray aganis Dauid steuart

The bailye court of Abirdene' haldin within the tolbutht of the samyn
the ix day of the monetht of Julij the yer' of god' jM VC and sevin yeris

The said day comperit Johnne of murray burges of the said burgh'
ande fande ane borghe in the handis of Normond' lesly ane of the officiaris
of the said burgh' that quhar Dauid steuart burges of the said burgh'
ressauit be the handis of alexander gray ij franche cronis xliiij eduard'
grotis ande half ane Inglis grot' of his pakit in ane clout witht
Dauid arnotis siluer merkit with the said Johnne murrais merk quhilkis
money the said Dauid grauntit him to haf ressauit tile haue
bene deliuerit to his wif as his bile deliuerit to the said'
Dauid proportis Ande aw to deliuer the said money to the said
Johhne and wrangis ande he do it nocht and tharto ane borgh'
and ane borgh' to folloue that borgh' The said Dauid being Requirit
in Jugment to Ansuer to the said borgh' askit the copy of the
said borgh' Ande ane lauchfull day to ansuer tharto And'
Incontinent thareftir the prouest ande bailyes discernyt the copy of
the said borgh' to the said Dauid and assignit him to ansuer to
the said borgh' one monunday the xij day of the said monetht
of Julij

The Bailye Court of abirdene haldin withtin the tolbutht of the
samyn one monunday the xij day of the monetht of Julij the yer' forsaid'

The said day Dauid steuart lauchfully warnit callit and
nocht comperit tile ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be Johnne of
murray burges of the said burgh' for the wranguis' withhaldin fra
him of ij franche crovnis xiiij eduard' grotis and' demi Inglis grot
tharfor the bailyes ordanit Normond' lesly officiar to pas' and
tak ane stres' of the said Dauid ande lat it Agane to borgh'
gif it be askit and warne him to comper this day xv dais befor
the prouest ande bailyes as first day of proces' to ansuer to the
said borgh'

The Bailye Court of Abirdene haldin withtin the tolbutht of the samyn
one monunday the xxvj day of the monetht of Julij the yer'
forsaid'

The said day Dauid steuart lauchfully warnit callit
ande nocht comperit tile ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be Johnne
of murray for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of ij franche cronis
xliiij eduard' grotis and demi Inglis groit tharfor the bailyes chargit
Normond' leslie officiar to pas' ande tak ane stres' of the said
Dauid and lat it Agane to borgh' gif it be askit and warne him
To comper' befor thame this day xv dais As Secund' day of
proces' to ansuer to the said borgh'

The Bailye Court of abirdene haldin withtin the tolbutht of the
samyne the ix day of the monetht of August the yer' fforsaid'

The said day Dauid Steuart lauchfully warnit callit and
nocht comperit tile ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be Johnne of
murray for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of ij franche crov
nis xliiij eduard' grotis ande half ane Inglis groit tharfor the bail
yes chargit Normond' lesly officiar' to pas' and tak ane stres'
of the said Dauid and lat it Agane to borgh' gif it be askit
and warne him To comper' this day xv dais befor the prouest and
bailyes to ansuer' to the said borgh' as thrid day of proces'

The bailye Court of Abirdene haldin within the tolbutht of the samyn
the xxiiij day of the monetht of august the yer' forsaid'

The said day Dauid steuart lauchfully warnit callit and
nocht comperit to ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be Johnne of
murray for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of ij franche cronis
xliiij eduard' grotis and demi Inglis grot tharfore the bailyes chargit
Normond' lesly Officiar to pas' ande tak ane stres' of the
said Dauid and lat it agane to borgh' gif it be askit and warne
him To comper' this day xv dais as ferd day of proces' to
ansuer to the said borgh'

The Bailye Court of abirdene haldin withtin the tolbutht of the
samyne the thrid day of the monetht of September the
yer' forsaid

The said day the borgh' fundin be Johnne of murray and Dauid
steuart for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of ij franche
crovnis xliiij eduard grotis and demi Inglis groit was continewit
with expres' consent and assent of baitht the said partijs in siclik
forme ande effect as it is now to this day xv dais but preiudice tile
ony of the said partijs or to the proces' led tharupoun' Obefor as to the ferd'
day of proces'

The Bailye Court' haldin within the tolbutht of the samyn
the xxtj day of the monetht of September the yer' fforsaid'

The said day comperit J Williame Rolland' ane of the procuratoris
of Johnne of murray ande Requirit the bailyeis to gar call
Dauid Steuart To comper' be him self or his procuratoris befor
the saidis balyeis as ferd day of proces' tile ansuer to the borgh' fun
din one him be the said Johnne Obefor for the wranguis' withhal
din fra him of ij franche cronis xliiij eduarde grotis and demi Inglis
groit quhilkis lauchfully callit and nocht comperit the said Williame Rolland'
fand' ane borgh' in the handis of Williame Scrimgeour ane of
the officiaris of the said burgh' that the said Johnne of murray hed'
cumin to his clame of the said Some ande recouerit it for nule
defence Ande the said Dauid nor his procuratouris nocht comperand' the
said Williame procuratour fand' ane vthir borgh' in the handis
of the said officiar that his said borgh' was awaile in defalt
of recoumptor and askit ward' ande dome tharof Ande thareftir the
said Williame Rolland' beand removit out of the Court the court
riply auisit wardit be thir personis Dauid mar Criste prat
Williame murray Androu prat Thom' riddall Alexander nory Alexander
Ranesone Richeard redhed' Thomas Straloch' Androu brabnar
Androu low gilbert tulidef Androw meldrum Alexander moresone Androu
bavne ande Alexander Ramsay burges of the said burgh' ande
wardaris the said borgh' fundin be the said Williame that the
said Johnne of murray hed recouerit the said Some of ij franche
crovnis xliiij eduard' groitis and demi Inglis groit was awaile And
that the said Dauid aucht to pay the samyne to the said Johnne
of murray Ande that was gevin for dome be the moutht of
Alexander Joffrasone dempstar of the said Court et cetera
